text.title: Football: Bayern beats Borussia Dortmund 5-4 on penalties to win German Super Cup

head.s: Football : Bayern beats Borussia Dortmund 5-4 on penalties to win German Super

p.s:
Yesterday , in the
German
DFL-Supercup
final , defending
Bundesliga
champions
Bayern Munich
defeated
DFB Pokal
cup winners
Borussia Dortmund
5 – 4 in the penalty shootout to win the title at
Dortmund
' s stadium
Signal Iduna Park
, after the full time ended in a 2 – 2 draw .

caption.s:
Bayern Munich lifting their sixth DFL-Super Cup trophy Image :
FC Bayern
.

p.s:
Dortmund got an early lead in the game as their winger
Christian Pulisic
opened the scoring in the 12th minute of the game .

Pulisic got the ball from Bayern Munich defender
Javi Martínez
and scored the first goal of the match .
18-year-old Pulisic became the youngest goalscorer in the competition history .

Six minutes later , Bayern equalized as striker
Robert Lewandowski
scored a close range tap-in from
Joshua Kimmich
' s assist .
The first half ended with 1 – 1 on the scoreboard .

Dortmund 's
Sokratis Papastathopoulos
was the only player to be booked in the first half .

After the half time , Dortmund 's
Sebastian Rode
was substituted in for
Mahmoud Dahoud
.
Later , Bayern made two changes .

In the 71st minute , Dortmund 's striker
Pierre-Emerick Augameyang
scored the second goal for Borussia , chipping over Bayern 's goalkeeper
Sven Ulreich
, restoring Dortmund 's lead .

With the 2 – 1 on the scoreboard , the match seemed to to end with Dortmund as the winner , but in the 88th minute , Dortmund 's Łukasz Piszczek scored an own goal , as the final time finished with a 2 – 2 draw , and the game proceeded to penalty shootouts .
took the first kick for Bayern and converted it into goal .

Joshua Kimmich 's kick was saved by Dortmund 's goalkeeper
Roman Bürki
while Rode was denied by Sven Ulreich .
The score reached a tie of 4 – 4 .

Ulreich stopped
Marc Bartra
' s kick as Bayern won their sixth Supercup title .
Dortmund had 48 % ball possession in the match , with 434 passes .
Bayern had 52 % ball possession , with five on target shoots of thirteen attempts .
A total 30 fouls were committed in the match and six players were shown yellow cards .

Bayern 's coach ,
Carlo Ancelotti
, congratulated the team and
tweeted
, " Proud of your effort .
Enjoy , Champions ! !
" ( ( de))German language : ‍Stolz auf unsere Arbeit und Bemühung .
Genießt es Gewinner ! !
Until yesterday , both Bayern and Borussia had five DFL-Supercup trophies .

Bayern 's forwards Robert Lewandoski and
Thomas Müller
has played in Supercup seven times .
Kimmich was awarded man of the match award .
Last season , Bayern defeated Dortmund in the DFB Pokal and the DFL Supercup .
